H3.text: where did the ancestors of the domestic goat originate. Iran

A4.text: The earliest remnants of domesticated goats dating 10,000 years Before Present are found in Ganj Dareh in Iran.

A5.text: It was one of the first animals to be domesticated, in Iran around 10,000 years ago.
